pkgmetadata.longdescription:
PyPanel is a lightweight panel/taskbar for X11 window managers that can be easily customized to match any desktop theme or taste.
Some of the customizable features include transparency w/ shading, panel dimensions and location, font type and colors, button events/actions, clock and workspace name display.
PyPanel should work with any WM that supports the EWMH specification. The following have been tested: Kahakai, Openbox3, PekWM, WindowMaker.
